examples:
What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I am trying to open and edit my presentation but I keep getting a message "An error occurred while saving your design. Please reload the page." I am reloading and keep getting the same message over and over again. And it's not letting me save manually.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: This has started happening very often. I can't save. I get this message: "We couldn't save your design. An error occurred while saving your desin. Please reload the page." - Every time I reload I get the same message. It happens from every computer I tried. I fix the problem by creating a new link. Which doesn't really save the problem as I have to redo everything.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: I was working with the design without problem, but now it appears, "saving error and I can't continue with the art. (message: We couldn't save your design, reload page)."

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: Any time I try to open my file that is saved and notification appears stating "We couldn't save your design: an error occurred while saving your design please reload he page." But I have made any changes to it, I'm just trying to open it.

Describe your issue: An error occured while saving design. Please help me, i can't edit my design.

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I cannot edit my designs, there is an error, when opening the design it closes immediately saying "It is not possible to save your design. An error occurred while saving your design. Reload the Page. "I didn't even ask to save, or anything, I want to enter to edit and canva won't let me. Can you see what happens? Thanks
